chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
W: world
V: world
K: hooks
A: Type
w: injects V W K
this: nid
p: proc this V A
P: state -> proc this V A -> Prop
j: PCM.sort (union_mapPCM Label dstatelet)
i: PCM.sort (union_mapPCM Label dstatelet)

Goal:
i \+ j \In Coh W -> always i p P -> always (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this W A) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely W2 this j j' & (exists q' : proc this V A, q = Inject w q' /\ P i' q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P i' (Ret v'))])

Premises:
Notation W2 := (inj_ext w)
Ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), A -> proc this W A
injects = Injection.injects : world -> world -> hooks -> Type
union_mapPCM = fun (K : ordType) (V : Type) => PCM.Pack (union_mapPCMMix K V) : ordType -> Type -> pcm Arguments union_mapPCM _ _%type_scope
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A | WithInv : forall (p : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv p I), W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii) -> proc this (mkWorld p) A -> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W
always : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> (state -> proc this W A -> Prop) -> Prop
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
nid = nat : Set
hooks = union_map hook_domain hook_type : Type
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
Inject : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
rely_ext : forall (i : state) (j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s : state), i \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (i \+ j) s -> exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, s = i' \+ j' /\ i' \In Coh V
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [V : world W : world K : hooks A : Type w : injects V W K this : nid p : proc this V A P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop i : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet |- Type] ?T' : [V : world W : world K : hooks A : Type w : injects V W K this : nid p : proc this V A P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop i : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet |- Type] ?f : [V : world W : world K : hooks A : Type w : injects V W K this : nid p : proc this V A P : state -> proc this V A ->...-> Prop i : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet |- seq ?T]
stepInject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (em : injects V W K) (s1 : state) (t : proc this V A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Inject em t) sc s2 q < -> (exists (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (v : A), [/\ sc = InjectRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1 & extends em s1 s1']) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this V A) (s1' s2' s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), [/\ sc = InjectStep sc', q = Inject em t', s1 = s1' \+ s, s2 = s2' \+ s, s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1' t sc' s2' t'])
alw_step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> pstep s1 p sc s2 q -> always s2 q P
alw_bnd : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (p1 : proc this W A) (p12 : proc this W B) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc this W B)) (s1 : state) (P : state -> B -> Prop), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc this W A) => forall (p : proc this W B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> always s2 p (fun (s : state) (q : proc this W B) => forall v0 : B, q = Ret v0 -> P s v0)) -> always s1 p12 (fun (s : state) (p : proc this W B) => forall v : B, p = Ret v -> P s v)
rely_split : forall (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \In Coh V -> s2 \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_rely V this s1 s2 /\ network_rely W2 this s1' s2'
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
alw_envs : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p : proc this W A) (s2 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s1 p P -> network_rely W this s1 s2 -> always s2 p P
alw_ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always s1 (Ret v) P
alw_act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> exists S : a_safe a s2, P s2 (Act a) /\ (forall (s3 : state) (v : A) (s4 : state), a_step S s3 v -> network_rely W this s3 s4 -> P s4 (Ret v))) -> always s1 (Act a) P
alw_coh : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In Coh W
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Injection.Exports.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
stepSeq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W B) (k : B -> proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Seq t k) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : B, [/\ sc = SeqRet, t = Ret v, q = k v, s2 = s1 & s1 \In Coh W]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (p' : proc this W B), [/\ sc = SeqStep sc', q = Seq p' k & pstep s1 t sc' s2 p'])
alw_refl : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> P s p
stepWithInv : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 : state) (t : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A) (pf : W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)), pstep s1 (WithInv pr I ii pf t) sc s2 q <-> (exists v : A, [/\ sc = WithInvRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1, s1 \In Coh W & W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A), [/\ sc = WithInvStep sc', q = WithInv pr I ii pf t', W = mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii), s1 \In Coh W & pstep s1 t sc...
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2]); _ : forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
alw_unfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always s1 Unfinished P
alwsafe_bnd : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (p1 : proc this W A) (p12 : proc this W B) (s1 : state) (pp2 : A -> Pred (proc this W B)), p12 \In pcat p1 pp2 -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc this W A) => forall (p : proc this W B) (v : A), p2 = Ret v -> p \In pp2 v -> always s2 p (fun=> xPredT)) -> always s1 p12 (fun=> xPredT)
Inductive proc (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) : Type := Unfinished : proc this W A | Ret : A -> proc this W A | Act : action W A this -> proc this W A | Seq : forall B : Type, proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A | Inject : forall (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A ->...-> proc this W A Arguments proc _ _ _%type_scope Arguments Unfinished {this W} {A}%type_scope Arguments Ret [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Act [this W] [A]%type_scope Arguments Seq [this W] [A B]%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Inject [this W] [A]%type_scope [V K] Arguments WithInv [this W] [A]%type_scope _ _%function_scope
alw_ret' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always_sc s1 (Ret v) scs P
alw_imp : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P1 P2 : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc this W A), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always s p P1 -> always s p P2
sem_split : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step (inj_ext w) this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
alw_safe : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> forall sc : schedule, safe p sc s
alw_coh' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In Coh W
rely_split' : forall (z : nid) (s1 : state) (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \In Coh V -> s2 \In Coh V -> network_step W z (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step V z s1 s2 /\ network_step W2 z s1' s2'
inject_step : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (s1' s2' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), valid (U \+ W) -> s1 \In Coh U -> s2 \In Coh U -> hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> network_step (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) this (s1 \+ s1') (s2 \+ s2') -> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step W this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2
alw_unfin' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always_sc s1 Unfinished scs P
sem_extend : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> forall (s1 s2 s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> s2 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
alw_imp' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P1 P2 : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (s0 : state) (p0 : proc this W A), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 s0 p0 -> P2 s0 p0) -> always_sc s p scs P1 -> always_sc s p scs P2
inject_frame : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (this : nid) (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s1 \+ s \In Coh (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> hook_complete U -> hook_complete W -> hooks_consistent (U \+ W).1 K -> world_not_hooked U K -> network_step (U \+ W \+ (Unit, K)) this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)
cohE : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s : state), Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh (inj_ext w) s2])
Seq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type), proc this W B -> (B -> proc this W A) -> proc this W A
pstep : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
step : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> schedule -> state -> proc this W A -> Prop
always_sc : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> proc this W A -> seq schedule -> (state -> proc this W A -> Prop) -> Prop
coh_split : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> hook_complete W2 -> exists s1 s2 : state, [/\ s1 \In Coh W1, s2 \In Coh W2 & s = s1 \+ s2]
cohUnKR : forall (U W : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s s' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), s \+ s' \In Coh (U \+ W) -> s \In Coh U -> hook_complete W -> s' \In Coh W

```coq
intros i j Coh_alwP_alwP.
intros i_p.
intros m q_alw Inject2_alwP.
destruct q_alw as [i' [j' [H1 [H2 [H3 [H4 H5]]]]].
exists i', j'.
split; [assumption | split; [apply H2 | split; [apply H3 | left; exists q;
  split; [apply H1 | apply Inject2_alwP]]]].
Qed.
```

original: intros i j Coh_alwP_alwP. intros i_p. intros m q_alw Inject2_alwP.
